question: What are the names of all British drivers?
sql: SELECT drivers.forename, drivers.surname FROM drivers WHERE drivers.nationality = 'British'
cypher: MATCH (driver:drivers) WHERE driver.nationality = 'British' RETURN driver.forename, driver.surname

question: List all races from 2020 ordered by round
sql: SELECT races.name, races.round FROM races WHERE races.year = 2020 ORDER BY races.round
cypher: MATCH (race:races) WHERE race.year = '2020' RETURN race.name, race.round ORDER BY race.round

question: Show all circuits located in Italy
sql: SELECT circuits.name, circuits.location FROM circuits WHERE circuits.country = 'Italy'
cypher: MATCH (circuit:circuits) WHERE circuit.country = 'Italy' RETURN circuit.name, circuit.location

question: Find all German constructors
sql: SELECT constructors.name FROM constructors WHERE constructors.nationality = 'German'
cypher: MATCH (constructor:constructors) WHERE constructor.nationality = 'German' RETURN constructor.name

question: List all drivers with the code 'HAM'
sql: SELECT drivers.forename, drivers.surname FROM drivers WHERE drivers.code = 'HAM'
cypher: MATCH (driver:drivers) WHERE driver.code = 'HAM' RETURN driver.forename, driver.surname

question: What are all the race names from the year 2019?
sql: SELECT races.name FROM races WHERE races.year = 2019
cypher: MATCH (race:races) WHERE race.year = '2019' RETURN race.name

question: Show circuits with altitude greater than 1000 meters
sql: SELECT circuits.name, circuits.alt FROM circuits WHERE circuits.alt > 1000
cypher: MATCH (circuit:circuits) WHERE circuit.alt > 1000 RETURN circuit.name, circuit.alt

question: Find all drivers born after January 1, 1990
sql: SELECT drivers.forename, drivers.surname, drivers.dob FROM drivers WHERE drivers.dob > '1990-01-01 00:00:00'
cypher: MATCH (driver:drivers) WHERE driver.dob > date('1990-01-01') RETURN driver.forename, driver.surname, driver.dob

question: List all Japanese constructors
sql: SELECT constructors.name, constructors.constructorRef FROM constructors WHERE constructors.nationality = 'Japanese'
cypher: MATCH (constructor:constructors) WHERE constructor.nationality = 'Japanese' RETURN constructor.name, constructor.constructorRef

sql: SELECT circuits.name, circuits.location FROM circuits WHERE circuits.country = 'UK'
cypher: MATCH (circuit:circuits) WHERE circuit.country = 'UK' RETURN circuit.name, circuit.location

question: Find all results where points scored were greater than 20
sql: SELECT results.resultId, results.points FROM results WHERE results.points > 20
cypher: MATCH (result:results) WHERE result.points > 20 RETURN result.resultId, result.points

question: What races were held in round 1?
sql: SELECT races.name, races.year FROM races WHERE races.round = 1
cypher: MATCH (race:races) WHERE race.round = '1' RETURN race.name, race.year
